content.question: The passage best illustrates which of the following developments of the Italian Renaissance?

choices.label: The political fragmentation of the Italian Peninsula
The emphasis on secular study of Greek and Roman texts
The creation of new approaches to the study of religious texts
The development of vernacular (common or local) literature

content.answer: The creation of new approaches to the study of religious texts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
